com.pilot.jword.ruler
Interface RulerObject

All Known Implementing Classes:
HRuler.FirstLineMark, HRuler.LeftMark, HRuler.ParagraphMark, HRuler.RightMark
public interface RulerObject

Interface for ruler objects like tab handles, left-right indent marks, borders etc

Field Summary
static int MAX_DISTANCE
           
 
Method Summary
 int calculateDistance(int x, int y)
          calculate distance to the given position return MAX_DISTANCE when out of range
 void moved(int x, int y)
          called when the object is moved to the given position take necessary action here (for example set indent, tab etc)

          paint this object to the given position
